exceptions.exn: In environment d : preDTA Unable to unify "Map bool" with "def_ok_app bool (ensemble_base state d) (dta_app_ne d)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall d : preDTA, def_ok_app bool (ensemble_base state d) (dta_app_ne d)

Premises:
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
ensemble_base : forall A : Set, Map A -> Map bool -> Prop
dta_app_ne = fun (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool) => dta_app_ne_aux d m m : preDTA -> Map bool -> Map bool
preDTA = Map state : Set
def_ok_app : forall A : Set, mEnsemble A -> (Map A -> Map A) -> Prop
state = Map prec_list : Set
dta_app_ne_aux_def_ok : forall (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool), def_ok_app bool (ensemble_base state d) (dta_app_ne_aux d m)
dta_non_empty_states_lazy = fun d : preDTA => lazy_power bool eqm_bool (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> Map bool
dta_non_empty_states = fun d : preDTA => power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> Map bool
semantic_equiv_1_2 : forall d : preDTA, pre_reconnait d prec_empty tnil (rec_empty d)
semantic_equiv_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> rec_term d a t (essence t d) = true
lattice_bounded_5 : forall (p : prechain bool) (A : Set) (m0 m1 : Map A), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A (M2 A m0 m1)) lem p -> exists p0 p1 : prechain bool, sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m0) lem p0 /\ sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m1) lem p1 /\ lem (M2 bool (prechain_last bool p0) (prechain_last bool p1)) (prechain_last bool p) /\ chain_length bool p0 + chain_length bool p1 = S (chain_length bool p)
lattice_bounded_def_0 = fun p : prechain bool => forall (A : Set) (m0 m1 : Map A), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A (M2 A m0 m1)) lem p -> exists p0 p1 : prechain bool, sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m0) lem p0 /\ sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m1) lem p1 /\ lem (M2 bool (prechain_last bool p0) (prechain_last bool p1)) (prechain_last bool p) /\ chain_length bool p0 + chain_length bool p1 = S (chain_length bool p) : prechain bool -> Prop
conservation_5 : forall (d : preDTA) (hd : term) (tl : term_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), S (essence hd d) <= essence_list (tcons hd tl) d (prec_cons a la ls)
map_mini_mini : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), mini bool lem (ensemble_base A x) (map_mini A x)
map_maxi_maxi : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), maxi bool lem (ensemble_base A x) (map_maxi A x)
lattice_bounded : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), bounded_sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A x) lem (S (MapCard A x))
lattice_bounded_10 : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A) (p : prechain bool), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m) lem p -> chain_length bool p <= S (MapCard A m)
mlattice : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), mLattice bool lem (ensemble_base A x) (map_mini A x) (map_maxi A x)
essence = fun (t : term) (d : preDTA) => S (term_high t) * S (DTA_taille d) : term -> preDTA -> nat
liste_rec_length_0 : forall d : preDTA, liste_rec_length_def d prec_empty tnil
rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil
pl_path_rec_equiv_0_0 : forall d : preDTA, pl_path_rec_equiv_0_def d prec_empty tnil
signature.pl_tl_length_rec_1 : forall d : preDTA, signature.pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 d prec_empty tnil
pl_path_rec_nil : forall d : preDTA, pl_path_recon d tnil pl_path_nil
semantic_equiv_0_1 = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (n : nat) (H : rec_list_terms d p tnil n = true) => let H0 : p = prec_empty := semantic_equiv_0_0 d p n H in (fun H1 : p = prec_empty => eq_ind_r (fun p0 : prec_list => liste_reconnait d p0 tnil) (rec_empty d) H1) H0 : sem_equiv_prop_l tnil
map_fill : forall A : Set, Map A -> bool -> Map bool
essence_list = fun (l : term_list) (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) => match l with | tnil => 1 | tcons _ _ => match pl with | prec_cons _ _ _ => taille_0 pl + S (term_high_0 l) * S (DTA_taille d) | prec_empty => 1 end end : term_list -> preDTA -> prec_list -> nat
Inductive pl_path_recon : preDTA -> term_list -> pl_path -> Prop := pl_path_rec_nil : forall d : preDTA, pl_path_recon d tnil pl_path_nil | pl_path_rec_cons : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_path_recon d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)
signature.predta_compatible_compat_def = fun d0 : preDTA => forall d1 : preDTA, signature.predta_compatible d0 d1 -> signature.dta_compat d0 d1 : preDTA -> Prop
signature.st_compat_check = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature.signature) => signature.st_compat_check_0 signature.pre_ad_empty sigma s : state -> signature.signature -> bool
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
map_maxi : forall A : Set, Map A -> Map bool
map_mini : forall A : Set, Map A -> Map bool
lattice_bounded_0 : forall m : Map bool, lattice_bounded_def_0 (single bool m)
lattice_bounded_3 : forall p : prechain bool, lattice_bounded_def_0 p -> forall m : Map bool, lattice_bounded_def_0 (concat bool p m)
signature.dta_correct = fun d : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> signature.mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> Prop
power_def_ok : forall (A : Set) (T : mEnsemble A) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), def_ok_app A T f -> T x -> T (power (Map A) f x n)
st_non_empty = fix st_non_empty (m : Map bool) (s : state) {struct s} : bool := match s with | @M0 _ => false | @M1 _ _ p => pl_non_empty m p | @M2 _ a b => st_non_empty m a || st_non_empty m b end : Map bool -> state -> bool
pl_path_recon_ind : forall P : preDTA -> term_list -> pl_path -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d tnil pl_path_nil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> P d tl plp -> P d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (t : term_list) (p0 : pl_path), pl_path_recon p t p0 -> P p t p0
iteres_dom_ok : forall (A : Set) (T : mEnsemble A) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), T x -> def_ok_app A T f -> prechain_dom_ok A T (iteres A f x n)
rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t
signature.st_compatible_compat_def = fun s0 : state => forall s1 : state, signature.st_compatible s0 s1 -> signature.mpl_compat s0 s1 : state -> Prop
iteres_def_ok : forall (A : Set) (T : mEnsemble A) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n k : nat), def_ok_app A T f -> T (power (Map A) f x n) -> T (power (Map A) f x (n + k))
signature.predta_compatible_compat_1 : forall (a : ad) (a0 : state), signature.predta_compatible_compat_def (M1 state a a0)
borne_1_1 : forall (a : ad) (s' s : state), state_in_dta (M1 state a s') s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille (M1 state a s')
